topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fba0ab63687213d9e10000#post_53fba0ab63687213d9e10000
Showa Ultramen are all in one continuity. 

Ultraseven itself doesn't have any continuity with The rest of Showa, So Sometimes He's in the Showa ultraman canon, Sometimes He's in his own continuity. 

Heisei's has more of an alternate universe thing going on. (There's the Tiga/Dyna continuity, Gaia, Cosmos, The First/Nexus, Max and Mebius are in the Showa continuity, Ginga and Ginga S are also in the showa continuity, But They're kind of ass, And the Zero films are set in a continuity where they're all Canon)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184
